property.name: address
property.formula: (SELECT ipall.ip_address FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations ipall WHERE ipall.port_id = id)

property.name: hostName
property.formula: (SELECT host.hostname FROM iyun_nova_vm host WHERE host.uuid = device_id)

property.name: hostId
property.formula: (SELECT host.id FROM iyun_nova_vm host WHERE host.uuid = device_id)

property.name: projectName
property.formula: (SELECT project.name FROM iyun_keystone_project project WHERE project.id = tenant_id)

property.name: deviceName
property.formula: (SELECT device.name FROM port_device device WHERE device.id = device_id)

property.name: netName
property.formula: (SELECT subnet.name FROM iyun_vdc_subnet subnet WHERE subnet.id = ( SELECT a.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations a WHERE a.port_id = id LIMIT 1 ))

property.name: netCidr
property.formula: (SELECT subnet.cidr FROM iyun_vdc_subnet subnet WHERE subnet.id = ( SELECT a.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations a WHERE a.port_id = id LIMIT 1 ))

property.name: netWorkId
property.formula: (SELECT subnet.network_id FROM iyun_vdc_subnet subnet WHERE subnet.id = (SELECT a.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations a WHERE a.port_id = id LIMIT 1 ))

property.name: subnetId
property.formula: (SELECT a.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations a WHERE a.port_id = id LIMIT 1)

property.name: ownerName
property.formula: (SELECT u.loginname from iyun_sm_user u where u.id = owner)
